title: BBC Local Live: Nottinghamshire on Monday 9 January 2017 - BBC News
summary: bird flu tests after swans found dead in clumber park .
sherwood forest anti-fracking petitions attract 200,000 signatures .
mansfield woman 's mystery bruise face illness .
dh lawrence 'repulsive village ' letter up for auction .
new owners set to take over notts county and forest .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 tuesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from local live today .
join us again tomorrow .

documents.title: weather : light showers tomorrow afternoon
text: a breezy night with variable cloud and a few light spots of rain and drizzle .
lows of 4c ( 39f ) .
a windy day on tuesday - variable cloud at first with a few brighter spells however turning increasingly dull , cloudy and drizzly with a few light showers later in the afternoon .
highs of 9c ( 48f ) .
author: Kay Crewdson
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: siblings school petition to be discussed
text: councillors are set to discuss a 4,500-name petition calling for out-of-catchment pupils to be allowed to attend the same schools as their siblings .
author: Nottingham Post

documents.title: cyclist hurt in blidworth hit-and-run
text: a cyclist was left with minor injuries after being knocked off his bike in a hit-and-run in blidworth on new year 's eve .
police said the 20-year-old was hit by a black vehicle in belle view lane between 21:30 and 22:50 .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: amazing sunset over notts
text: amazing sunset over notts
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: fire at former pit
text: fire crews have been called to a derelict building at the thorseby colliery site .
they needed one jet to extinguish the fire , which the service says was due to excess oil on machinery .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
text: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : fire delays beeston buses
text: there are delays of up to 20 minutes on local links l10 and l11 due to an earlier fire on wollaton road in # beeston .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: defra confirm clumber bird flu tests
text: the carcasses of 12 dead swans discovered in clumber park are currently being tested for bird flu , the government 's confirmed .
they should know in the next few days whether the birds died from the h5n8 strain of the disease , which has killed nine swans down in dorset .
there have been confirmed cases in leicestershire and lincolnshire , defra said , but this would be the first outbreak of the disease in nottinghamshire .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : city lane closure causing delays
text: the lane is due to be closed for six weeks
there is some build up of congestion on l parliament st and huntingdon st going s bnd due to lane closure at biocity
expect further congestion tonight on pennyfoot st and manvers st
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: council to act over offensive 'gypsy door ' sign
text: this offensive sign , which appeared in rainworth over the weekend , is being taken down by the local council .
it appeared in the village after plans for a new travellers site off churchfield drive were revealed .
a spokeswoman for mansfield district council said they 've had no reports about the offensive sign , which appears to be painted on a door and tied to a lamppost .
however , the authority will be sending staff out to take it down .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: east midlands weather update : isolated showers
text: the theme of this week is breezy conditions and it 'll be turning colder towards the end of the week .

however , unlike most of the north , we do n't have any weather warnings ( as of yet ) and the cold air coming to us towards the end of the week is not related to the cold currently being felt in europe .
for the rest of the afternoon , it will be dry and bright with a few isolated showers .
author: Kay Crewdson
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: busiest ever hour at qmc a & e
text: the pressure on nottingham 's a & e since new year has continued the qmc was on black alert last week for the third time this winter .
`` black '' is the highest state for alert and shows a health and social care system under huge strain .
last monday , the hospital had their busiest ever hour - with 180 patients presenting at a & e in just one hour .
that 's one patient every 20 seconds , on average .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: red cross volunteers provided ambulances
text: it 's the first time in years that the british red cross has been deployed in this way .
volunteers provided refreshments for ambulance staff and patients at queen 's medical centre , it 's been confirmed .
the charity 's ambulances were also used to take some patients home .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: red cross volunteers support nottingham a & e
text: you might have seen the controversial comments made by the british red cross this weekend , describing the `` humanitarian crisis '' in the nhs .
well it 's now been revealed that the charity has been called in by east midlands ambulance service to help them cope with huge frontline pressures this winter .
volunteers supported staff and patients at a & e units at nottingham on new year 's day .
the charity also helped at emergency units in leicester , lincoln , kettering and northampton .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a1 congestion
text: there 's more traffic than usual on the a1 northbound in newark between balderton and coddington .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: travel : a60 delays
text: there 's currently heavier than usual traffic on the a60 mansfield road in ravensheard around the blidworth waye junction .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: would-be distraction burglar fled after challenge
text: police have issued a warning after a man walked into a house in long eaton claiming he was there to check the meter .
after being challenged , however , the man turned and left .
the incident took place between 13:00 and 14:00 on thursday .
the man has been described as white , aged about 55 , of medium build and about 6ft tall .
he had short , curly grey hair , was clean shaven , and was described as having `` yellowed front teeth '' .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: clumber park bird flu fears after swans found dead
text: twelve swans have been found dead at clumber park prompting bird flu concerns .
author: Retford Times

documents.title: missing teenager found
text: angel callaghan , 15 , who was reported missing by nottinghamshire police earlier has been found safe and well .
thanks if you shared our appeals .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cricket : lumb leads sydney sixers to win
text: nottinghamshire opener michael lumb hit 31 in his first appearance for the sydney sixers at this year 's big bash .
the 36-year-old 's runs helped his side to a six-wicket win against the melbourne renegades .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: east midlands weather update : drier later
text: rain will gradually clear away this afternoon , leaving some drier and brighter conditions for a time .
it will be breezy with highs of 9c ( 48f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: surveys 'do not include fracking '
text: ineos said it was `` exploring the viability '' of shale gas across the country and its seismic imaging surveys `` do not include fracking in any form . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'leave sherwood forest alone '
text: lorna greenwood , from 38 degrees , said people were `` demanding that sherwood forest - home to rare wildlife and ancient trees - be left alone '' .
the government gave ineos licences to explore for shale gas on a million acres of land across the uk .
as part of this , the company wants to carry out seismic imaging surveys at sherwood forest and other locations .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sherwood forest anti-fracking petitions signed by 200k
text: you 'll have no doubt seen the story over the weekend about a protest against plans to survey sherwood forest for shale gas .
chemicals firm ineos wants to scan land under the ancient forest to see if there 's a potential for fracking .
campaign groups 38 degrees and friends of the earth have started petitions that call on the forestry commission to keep ineos out of the forest .
since friday , more than 200,000 signatures have been gathered .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: have you seen angel ?
text: police have put out an appeal to find a 15-year-old girl who went missing about 23:00 last night in new ollerton .
angel callaghan , who has links to grimsby , was last seen wearing a brown and cream striped top with black leggings .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tennis : rae in fed cup team
text: nottingham tennis player jocelyn rae has been included in the gb fed cup team .
she 'll be appearing alongside johanna konta , heather watson and laura robson .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: 'obscene ' lawrence book banned in 1929
text: here is sean bean and joely richardson in a bbc adaptation of one of lawrence 's novels , lady chatterley 's lover .
the book was banned in britain in 1929 on the grounds it was `` obscene '' .
but a clause in the obscene publications act allowed publishers to escape conviction if they could show a work had literary merit .
after a sensational trial in 1960 the prosecution failed to make the case that it was obscene and within a year it had outsold the bible , shifting two million copies .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: smith sees light at end of notts tunnel
text: smith sees light at end of notts tunnel

documents.title: lawrence letter expected to fetch £ 1,200
text: lawrence , who wrote lady chatterley 's lover , sons and lovers and the rainbow , was inquiring about cottages to let in the pangbourne area .
a spokesman for auction house lyon and turnbull said the author had been in a `` peevish mood '' at the time the note was written .
he 'd been living in relative poverty two years after he was forced to leave his cornish home following claims he and his german wife had been signalling to enemy submarines .
the letter 's expected to sell for £ 1,200 on wednesday .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: dh lawrence letter : 'pangbourne is repulsive '
text: it 's fair to say dh lawrence - arguably nottinghamshire 's most famous author - was n't shy of using a few controversial words .
the eastwood-born author is in the news today for the way he described a berkshire village back in 1919 .
in a letter , being auctioned in edinburgh this week , he described pangbourne as repulsive and smelly .
`` women use scent on their clothes , and petrol plus river plus pavement i suffer by the nose , '' he wrote .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: osborn 'embarrassed ' by forest display
text: osborn 'embarrassed ' by forest display

documents.title: man hit by train at tuxford
text: british transport police has said a man was hit by a train at tuxford west junction about 08:40 this morning .
`` we attended , alongside colleagues from the ambulance service , but the person was sadly declared dead at the scene , '' a statement on their website said .
it 's not believed to be sus and officers are trying to contact the man 's next of kin .
a spokesman for btp just told me they 've handed the lines back to network rail a couple of minutes ago so services should start to get back to normal .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cyclist seriously injured in hit-and-run
text: the front windscreen of a car was smashed in a hit-and-run in sutton-in-ashfield , which left a cyclist with serious injuries last month .
a man was knocked off his bike as he was turning into the travellers rest pub car park , off huthwaite road , at around 14:30 on friday 9 december , police said .
the black vauxhall insignia vxr , which had blacked out windows also smashed a headlight in the crash , but sped from the scene .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: forest : villa 'made bid for lansbury '
text: aston villa boss steve bruce has confirmed the club had made an approach for nottingham forest midfielder henri lansbury but said they still face competition for the 26-year-old .
`` we have made an enquiry but four other clubs have too , '' bruce said .
`` we believe he is for sale but that has n't been confirmed yet . ''
last week forest boss philippe montanier admitted other clubs have bid for lansbury , but did not name them .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

text: manvers st / pennyfoot st queuing traffic due to lane restriction of pennyfoot delays expected .

documents.title: notts county and forest about to be sold
text: it 's the start of what could be a momentous week for both nottingham football clubs with notts county and nottingham forest both on the verge of being sold to new owners .
today is the expected completion date at notts , with alan hardy set to buy the club from ray trew and pay off an outstanding tax bill , so removing a transfer embargo currently on the club .
massive !

documents.title: wedding joy for bruise face pair
text: there has been some good news for ms uden , however , after she and fiance chris north ( won the use of a £ 10,000 venue for their wedding .
`` it 's just been a piece of normality that we can have back that we can do the same things that everyone else can do , '' she said .
`` our dally life is just about being ill all day and now we 've got something we can focus on . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'i do n't look in mirror '
text: she began suffering pains not long after she had an emergency caesarean section .
the marks , that are painless , started to appear `` at an alarming rate '' , she said .
`` i do n't look in the mirror - i hate it , '' she said .
`` i ca n't stand the way it looks and the more i see it , the more it reminds me of what i used to be like .
i try not to go out unless i need to , purely because i do n't like people staring at me . ''
author: Alex Smith
BBC News Online

documents.title: 'she 's said goodbye several times '
text: adele 's mum karen said her daughter is `` constantly bleeding '' , leading to frequent hospital trips .
she also takes 250 tablets a week .
her most recent hospital stay on wednesday ended up with her in the resuscitation unit dipping `` in and out of consciousness '' .
`` it 's very serious if she does n't get to hospital on time she could bleed out , '' she said .
`` we need some answers because at the moment we 're shooting in the dark .
we 've nearly lost her .
[ adele ] has said her goodbyes a number of times . ''
author: Alex Smith
BBC News Online

documents.title: fears over woman 's mystery bruise face illness
text: this is adele uden .
you might notice what appear to be bruises on her face but she has n't been in an accident or attacked .
it 's a symptom of a mystery illness that causes the 26-year-old from mansfield to suffer heavy bleeding and dark marks to appear all over her face .
she 's had the puzzling condition since the birth of her son six years ago and her family say her health is worsening and fear she might die .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live
